maqras.text: 11|24|donon samudaay kee dasha aisee hai, jaise ek andha aur bahara ho aur doosara dekhane aur sunane vaala ho. to kya donon kee dasha samaan ho sakatee hai? kya tum (is antar ko) nahin samajhate
11|25|aur hamane nooh ko usakee jaati kee or rasool banaakar bheja. unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, main tumhaare lie khule roop se saavadhaan karane vaala hoon.
11|26|ki ibaadat (vandana) keval allaah hee kee karo. main tumhaare oopar duhkh daayee din kee yaatana se darata hoon.

11|27|to un pramukhon ne, jo unakee jaati mein se kaafir ho gaye, kahaah hamato tujhe apane hee jaisa maanav purush dekh rahe hain aur ham dekh rahe hain ki tumhaara anusaran kevan vahee log kar rahe hain, jo hamamen neech hain. vo bhee bina soche-samajhe aur ham apane oopar tumhaaree koee pradhaanata bhee nahin dekhate, balki ham tumhen jhootha samajhate hain.

11|28|us (arthaat nooh) ne kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! tumane is baat par vichaar kiya ki yadi main apane paalanahaar kee or se ek spasht pramaan par hoon aur mujhe usane apane paas se ek daya[1] pradaan kee ho, phir vah tumhen sujhaayee na de, to kya ham use tumase chipaka[2] den, jabaki tum use nahin chaahate

11|29|aur he meree jaati ke logo! main is (saty ke prachaar) par tumase koee dhan nahin maangata. mera badala to allaah ke oopar hai aur main unhen (apane yahaan se) dhutakaar nahin sakata, jo eemaan laaye hain, nishchay ve apane paalanahaar se milane vaale hain, parantu main dekh raha hoon ki tum jaahilon jaisee baaten kar rahe ho.
11|30|aur he meree jaati ke logo! kaun allaah kee pakad se[1] mujhe bachaayega, yadi main unhen apane paas se dhutakaar doon? kya tum sochate nahin ho

11|31|aur main tumase ye nahin kahata ki mere paas allaah ke koshaagaar (khazaane) hain aur na main gupt baaton ka gyaan rakhata hoon aur ye bhee nahin kahata ki main farishta hoon aur ye bhee nahin kahata ki jinhen tumhaaree aankhen ghrna se dekhatee hain, allaah unhen koee bhalaee nahin dega. allaah adhik jaanata hai, jo kuchh unake dilon mein hai. yadi main aisa kahoon, to nishchay atyaachaariyon mein ho jaoonga.
11|32|unhonne kahaah he nooh! toone hamase jhagada kiya aur bahut jhagad liya, ab vo (yaatana) la do, jisakee dhamakee hamen dete ho, yadi tum sach bolane vaalon mein ho.
11|33|usane kahaah use to tumhaare paas allaah hee laayega, yadi vah chaahega aur tum (use) vivash karane vaale nahin ho.
11|34|aur meree shubh-chinta tumhen koee laabh nahin pahuncha sakatee, yadi main tumhaara hit chaahoon, jabaki allaah tumhen kupath karana chaahata ho aur tum usee kee or lautaaye jaoge.

11|35|kya ve kahate hain ki usane ye baat svayan bana lee hai? tum kaho ki yadi mainne ise svayan bana liya hai, to mera aparaadh mujhee par hai aur main nirdosh hoon, us aparaadh se, jo tum kar rahe ho.
11|36|aur nooh kee or vahyee (prakaashana) kee gayee ki tumhaaree jaati mense eemaan nahin laayenge, unake siva, jo eemaan la chuke hain. atah usase duhkhee na bano, jo ve kar rahe hain.
11|37|aur hamaaree aankhon ke saamane hamaaree vahyee ke anusaar ek naav banao aur mujhase unake baare mein kuchh[1] na kahana, jinhonne atyaachaar kiya hai. vaastav mein, ve doobane vaale hain.

11|38|aur vah naav banaane laga aur jababhee usakee jaati ke pramukh usake paas se guzarate, to usakee hansee udaate. nooh ne kahaah yadi tum hamaaree hansee udaate ho, to hamabhee aise hee (ek din) tumhaaree hansee udayenge.
11|39|phir tumhen sheeghr hee gyaan ho jaayega ki kisapar apamaanakaaree yaatana aayegee aur sthaayee duhkh kisapar utarega

11|40|yahaan tak ki jab hamaara aadesh aa gaya aur tannoor ubalane laga, to hamane (nooh se) kahaah usamen pratyek prakaar ke jeevon ke do jode rakh lo aur apane parijanon ko, unake siva, jinake baare mein pahale bata diya gaay hai aur jo eemaan laaye hain aur usake saath thode hee eemaan laaye the.
